org.kuali.kfs.gl.batch.service
Interface FilteringBalanceIterator

All Superinterfaces:
Iterable, Iterator
All Known Implementing Classes:
FilteringBalanceIteratorImpl
public interface FilteringBalanceIterator
extends Iterator, Iterable

An extension of the Iterator interface that allows for balances to be selected or not

See Also:
BalancePredicate
